sect3.title: Program Files
sect3.para: as86, as86_encap, ld86, nm86 (link to objdump86), objdump86 and size86 (link to objdump86)

sect4.title: as86
sect4.para: as86 is an assembler for the 8086...80386 processors.

sect4.title: as86_encap
sect4.para: as86_encap is a shell script to call as86 and convert the created binary into a C file prog.v to be included in or linked with programs like boot block installers.

sect4.title: ld86
sect4.para: ld86 understands only the object files produced by the as86 assembler. It can link them into either an impure or a separate I&D executable.

sect4.title: nm86
sect4.para: The symbol table of the binary file.

sect4.title: objdump86
sect4.para: Dumps detailed information about a binary file.

sect4.title: size86
sect4.para: Summary sizes of the data in a binary file.
